LanguageData.SculptingSpeed.label: sculpting speed
LanguageData.SculptingSpeed.description: The speed at which this person creates sculptures.\n\nThis stat only affects the how fast sculptures are produced, not their quality. Quality is determined by the sculptor's artistic skill.
LanguageData.TailoringSpeed.label: tailoring speed
LanguageData.TailoringSpeed.description: The speed at which this person makes clothes.\n\nThis stat only affects how fast clothes are produced, not their quality. Quality is determined by the tailor's crafting skill.
LanguageData.SmithingSpeed.label: smithing speed
LanguageData.SmithingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person crafts weapons, machinery, and ammunition.\n\nThis stat only affects how fast items are produced, not their quality. Quality is determined by the crafter's skill.
LanguageData.DrugProductionSpeed.label: drug production speed
LanguageData.DrugProductionSpeed.description: How fast this character produces drugs.
LanguageData.CookSpeed.label: cooking speed
LanguageData.CookSpeed.description: The speed at which this person cooks meals.
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChance.label: food poison chance
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChance.description: The probability that this character will inadvertently poison a meal they cook. Food poison temporarily debilitates anyone it strikes.
LanguageData.BrewingSpeed.label: brewing speed
LanguageData.BrewingSpeed.description: The speed at which this person brews beer.
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshSpeed.label: butchery speed
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshSpeed.description: The speed at which this person butchers flesh creatures.
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidSpeed.label: mechanoid disassembly speed
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidSpeed.description: The speed at which this person can disassemble a mechanoid.
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshEfficiency.label: butchery efficiency
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshEfficiency.description: The amount of meat produced when butchering flesh creatures. The actual amount is also related to the creature's size.
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidEfficiency.label: mechanoid disassembly efficiency
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidEfficiency.description: The amount of materials yielded when this person disassembles a dead mechanoid. The actual amount is also related to the mechanoid's size.
LanguageData.SmeltingSpeed.label: smelting speed
LanguageData.SmeltingSpeed.description: The speed at which this person smelts things.\n\nSince smelting is dumb labor, smelting speed is not affected by any skill.
